desc: Isomap EmbeddingNon-linear dimensionality reduction through Isometric Mapping Read more in the scikit-learn user guide.

params.name: n neighbors
params.desc: number of neighbors to consider for each point.

params.name: n components
params.desc: number of coordinates for the manifold

params.name: eigen solver
params.desc: ‘auto’ : Attempt to choose the most efficient solver for the given problem. ‘arpack’ : Use Arnoldi decomposition to find the eigenvalues and eigenvectors. ‘dense’ : Use a direct solver (i.e. LAPACK) for the eigenvalue decomposition.

params.name: tol
params.desc: Convergence tolerance passed to arpack or lobpcg. not used if eigen_solver == ‘dense’.

params.name: max iter
params.desc: Maximum number of iterations for the arpack solver. not used if eigen_solver == ‘dense’.

params.name: path method
params.desc: Method to use in finding shortest path. ‘auto’ : attempt to choose the best algorithm automatically. ‘FW’ : Floyd-Warshall algorithm. ‘D’ : Dijkstra’s algorithm.

params.name: neighbors algorithm
params.desc: Algorithm to use for nearest neighbors search, passed to neighbors.NearestNeighbors instance.

params.name: n jobs
params.desc: The number of parallel jobs to run. If -1, then the number of jobs is set to the number of CPU cores.

attrs.name: kernel pca
attrs.desc: KernelPCA object used to implement the embedding.

attrs.name: nbrs
attrs.desc: Stores nearest neighbors instance, including BallTree or KDtree if applicable.

attrs.name: dist matrix
attrs.desc: Stores the geodesic distance matrix of training data.
